doc.after: Common ailments in domestic guinea pigs include respiratory tract infections diarrhea scurvy vitamin C deficiency typically characterized by sluggishness abscesses due to infection often in the neck due to hay embedded in the throat or from external scratches and infections by lice mites or fungus 101
